title: go.tools/cmd/ssadump not gettable on windows 7
body:
by **Elliott.Stoneham**: 
What steps will reproduce the problem?
> go get code.google.com/p/go.tools/cmd/ssadump

What is the expected output?
ssadump installs

What do you see instead?
# code.google.com/p/go.tools/ssa/interp
src\code.google.com\p\go.tools\ssa\interp\external_windows.go:42: undefined: syscall
src\code.google.com\p\go.tools\ssa\interp\ops.go:943: cannot use fd (type int) as type
syscall.Handle in function argument

Which compiler are you using (5g, 6g, 8g, gccgo)?
8g

Which operating system are you using?
Windows 7 Starter SP1 32-bit

Which version are you using?  (run 'go version')
go1.2 windows/386
